mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM, no, title, content, regDate, fix, filePath from notice_board where fix = true order by regDate DESC ) as one union all select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM, no, title, content, regDate, fix, filePath from ( select * from notice_board where fix = false and title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by no ASC) as three order by regDate DESC,ROWNUM DESC limit ${listSize} offset ${startList} ) as two
select count(*) as listCnt from notice_board
select count(*) from notice_board where TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%';

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM, no, title, content, regDate, fix, filePath from notice_board where fix = true order by regDate DESC ) as one union all select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM, no, title, content, regDate, fix, filePath from ( select * from notice_board where fix = false order by no ASC) as three order by regDate DESC,ROWNUM DESC limit ${listSize} offset ${startList} ) as two
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() ROWNUM,* from notice_board order by regDate DESC,ROWNUM DESC limit ${listSize} offset ${startList}
